Date: 13.02.2025
Addendum-V to AVSEC Circular 4/2022 .

Sub: Access of Vehicles up to Tarmac Area of Civil Airports in the Country on
Protocol/ Medical/ Security grounds -reg.

In exercise of powers conferred under rule 22 (3)(b), 31, 32 and 62 of Aircraft (Security)
Riles 2023, the Director General, Bureau of Civil Aviation Security, for the purpose of the
safety and security of passengers, crew, ground personnel and general public in all
Matters relating to safeguarding against acts of interference with civil aviation, directs for
partial modification in AvSec Circular No. 4/2022 dated 28.10.2022 issued on the subject
matter.

2. Permission is hereby accorded to Shri Shatrughan Sinha, Member of Parliament,
Lok Sabha, on medical ground for utilizing the facility of airport ferry vehicles at all
airports for access up to aircraft.

3. The other contents of the AvSec Circular No. 4/2022 dated 28.10.2022 shall remain
unchanged, All concerned shall implement this with immediate effect.

Director General
